programme.title: The Distance | Five Rings Films
programme.desc: The story of an enduring Japanese marathon tradition and a humble champion named Naoko Takahashi who captured her nation’s imagination with a run for the ages at the 2000 Olympic Games.

programme.title: Track and Field - Day 8 - Afternoon | Athletics | Olympic Games Paris 2024
programme.desc: This event took place on 07/08/2024 at the Stade de France, Paris. It includes the Finals for Women's Long Jump, Men's 200m, Men's Javelin Throw, Women's 400m Hurdles and Men's 110m Hurdles. It also includes the Women's Heptathlon 200m and Shot Put, and the Women's 1500m Semi-Final.

programme.title: Mixed Relay Final | Triathlon | Olympic Games Paris 2024
programme.desc: The Mixed Relay Triathlon Final took place at Pont Alexandre III on August 5, 2024 in Paris, France. Germany claimed Gold, United States Silver, and Great Britain completed the podium.

programme.title: Running in North Korea | Film
programme.desc: A new Original documentary that captures the incredible journey of Aimee Fuller and Mirjam Jaeger as they travel to Pyongyang to participate in the 2019 Mangyongdae Prize International Marathon and meet fellow Olympians from the Democratic People’s Republic of Korea.

programme.title: Track and Field - Day 11 - Morning | Athletics | Olympic Games Paris 2024
programme.desc: This event took place on 06/08/2024 at the Stade of France. It includes the Women's 200m and 800m Finals, the Men's Pole Vault Final, the Women's Hammer Throw Final, the Men's 400m Hurdles Victory Ceremony, the Women's Long Jump Victory Ceremony, the Men's 200m Semifinals as well as the Men's 110m Hurdles and 5000m Rounds 1 and the Men's Shot Put Qualifying Round.

programme.title: Track and Field - Day 11 - Afternoon | Athletics | Olympic Games Paris 2024
programme.desc: This event took place on 06/08/2024 at the Stade of France. It included the Women's 400m Hurdles Semi-Final, and Men's 400m Semi-Final. Later, at the Women's Hammer Throw Final, Camryn Rogers (CAN) claimed the Gold medal. At the Men's Long Jump Final, Miliadis Tentoglou (GRE) won the Gold. Then came the Men's 1500m Final, where Cole Hocker (USA) claimed victory and the Gold medal. At the Women's 3000m Steeplechase Final, it was Winfred Yavi (BRN) who came in first and took the Gold. Finally, at the Women's 200m Final, the Gold was claimed by Gabrielle Thomas (USA).

programme.title: Men's 400m Hurdles Final | Athletics | Olympic Games Paris 2024
programme.desc: The Men's 400m Hurdles Final took place at Stade de France, on 09/08/24. Rai Benjamin (USA) won Gold with a time of 46.46 seconds. Karsten Warholm (NOR) won Silver and Alison dos Santos (BRA) completed the podium.

programme.title: Women's 100m Hurdles Final | Athletics | Olympic Games Paris 2024
programme.desc: The Women's 100m Hurdles Final took place at Stade de France, on 10/08/24. Masai Russell (USA) won Gold with a time of 12.33 seconds. Cyrena Samba-Mayela (FRA) won Silver and Jasmine Camacho-Quinn completed the podium.

programme.title: Anatomy of: Archery, Rhythmic Gymnastics, and Marathon
programme.desc: In a sports science lab, we studied the physiques of archer Atanu Das, rhythmic gymnast Ekaterina Selezneva, and marathon runner Desiree Linden to find out what makes them special at their sports.

programme.title: Men's Marathon | Athletics | Olympic Games Paris 2024
programme.desc:
The Men's Marathon starts at Paris City Hall and finishes on the Esplanade des Invalides, Paris on 10/08/24.
The Golden medal was for Tamirat Tola (ETH), Bashir Abdi was the Silver medal (BEL), Benson Kipruto (KEN) won the Bronze medal.

programme.title: Final Women's 400m Hurdles | Athletics | Olympic Games Paris 2024
programme.desc: The Women's 400m Hurdles Final took place at Stade de France, on 08/08/24. Sydney McLaughlin-Levrone (USA) won Gold with a World Record time of 50.37 seconds. Anna Cockrell (USA) won Silver, and Femke Bol (NED) completed the podium.

programme.title: Men's 110m Hurdles Final | Athletics | Olympic Games Paris 2024
programme.desc: The Men's 110m Hurdles Final took place at Stade de France, on 08/08/24. Grant Holloway (USA) won Gold with a time of 12.99 seconds. Daniel Roberts (USA) won Silver, and Rasheed Broadbell (JAM) completed the podium.

programme.title: Marathon Race Walk Mixed Relay | Athletics | Olympic Games Paris 2024
programme.desc: This Marathon Race Walk Mixed Relay took place at the Trocadero, Paris, on 07/08/24. Martin A/Perex M (ESP) won the Gold with a time of 2:50:31 hours. Pintado BD/Morejon G (ECU) claimed Silver, and Cowley R/Montag J (AUS) completed the podium.

programme.title: Women's Final | Triathlon | Olympic Games Paris 2024
programme.desc:
The Women's Triathlon Final took place on day five of the Olympic Games Paris 2024 at Pont Alexandre III on July 31, 2024 in Paris, France.
Cassandre Beaugrand (FRA) won first place, Julie Derron (SUI) won second place and Beth Potter (GBR) took third place.

programme.title: Mixed Relay Final | Triathlon | Olympic Games Paris 2024
programme.desc: The Mixed Relay Triathlon Final took place at Pont Alexandre III on August 5, 2024 in Paris, France. Germany claimed Gold, United States Silver, and Great Britain completed the podium.

programme.title: The Distance | Five Rings Films
programme.desc: The story of an enduring Japanese marathon tradition and a humble champion named Naoko Takahashi who captured her nation’s imagination with a run for the ages at the 2000 Olympic Games.

programme.title: Track and Field - Day 11 - Afternoon | Athletics | Olympic Games Paris 2024
programme.desc: This event took place on 06/08/2024 at the Stade of France. It included the Women's 400m Hurdles Semi-Final, and Men's 400m Semi-Final. Later, at the Women's Hammer Throw Final, Camryn Rogers (CAN) claimed the Gold medal. At the Men's Long Jump Final, Miliadis Tentoglou (GRE) won the Gold. Then came the Men's 1500m Final, where Cole Hocker (USA) claimed victory and the Gold medal. At the Women's 3000m Steeplechase Final, it was Winfred Yavi (BRN) who came in first and took the Gold. Finally, at the Women's 200m Final, the Gold was claimed by Gabrielle Thomas (USA).

programme.title: Personal Best: Paris 2024
programme.desc: Relive the Paris 2024 Olympic Games through the journeys of eight remarkable athletes who pushed past limits, defied expectations, and inspired the world. Featuring Noah Lyles, Faith Kipyegon, Jack Robinson, Huang Yaqiong and Zheng Siwei, Leon Marchand, Olga Kharlan and Cindy Ngamba.

programme.title: Women's Kayak (K1) Semi-Final & Final | Canoe Slalom | Olympic Games Paris 2024
programme.desc: The Kayak (K1) Semifinal and Final took place at Nautical St - White Water, on 28/07/24. The Australian Jessica Fox won the Gold with a time of 96.08 seconds. Klaudia Zwolinska (POL) won the Silver, and Kimberley Woods (GBR) won the Bronze Medal.

programme.title: The Distance | Five Rings Films
programme.desc: The story of an enduring Japanese marathon tradition and a humble champion named Naoko Takahashi who captured her nation’s imagination with a run for the ages at the 2000 Olympic Games.

programme.title: Finals Piste: Women's Foil Team Bronze & Gold Medal Bouts | Fencing | Olympic Games Paris 2024
programme.desc: The Women's Foil Team Bronze and Gold Medal Bouts took place on 01/08/2024 at the Grand Palais - Podium Piste. In the Gold Medal Bout, United States of America won the Gold over Italy, who won Silver. In the Bronze Medal Bout, Japan took the Bronze over Canada.

programme.title: Meet the entourage of Miles Chamley-Watson, Jaime Espinal and Devin Logan
programme.desc: Miles Chamley-Watson (USA) x Tattoo artist; Jaime Espinal (PUR) x Mentor; Devin Logan (USA) x Ski Technician

programme.title: Women's 200m Butterfly - Final | Swimming | Olympic Games Paris 2024
programme.desc: The Women's 200m Butterfly was held on 01/08/2024 at Paris La Defense Arena. Summer McIntosh (CAN) claimed Gold with an Olympic record time of 2:03.03, Regan Smith (USA) took Silver and Yufei Zhang (CHN) completed the podium.

programme.title: Women's 4x200m Freestyle Relay - Final | Swimming | Olympic Games Paris 2024
programme.desc: The Women's 4x200m Freestyle Relay was held on 01/08/2024 at Paris La Defense Arena. Australia claimed Gold with an Olympic record time of 07:38.08, United States of America took Silver and China completed the podium.

programme.title: Men's 200m Backstroke - Final | Swimming | Olympic Games Paris 2024
programme.desc: The Men's 200m Backstroke was held on 01/08/2024 at Paris La Defense Arena. Hubert Kos (HUN) claimed Gold with a time of 1:54.26, Apostolos Christou (GRE) took Silver and Roman Mityukov (SUI) completed the podium.

programme.title: Women's 200m Breaststroke - Final | Swimming | Olympic Games Paris 2024
programme.desc: The Women's 200m Breastroke was held on 01/08/2024 at Paris La Defense Arena. Kate Douglass (USA) claimed Gold with a time of 02:19.24, Tatjana Smith (RSA) took Silver and Tes Schouten (NED) completed the podium.

programme.title: Road to Glory - Aquatics
programme.desc: The best diving, swimming and water polo stories from throughout Olympic history including Dawn Fraser, Greg Louganis and Michael Phelps.

programme.title: Women's Individual All-Around Final | Artistic Gymnastics | Olympic Games Paris 2024
programme.desc: The Women's Individual All-Around Final took place at Bercy Arena on 01/08/2024. Simone Biles won Gold (USA), Rebeca Andrade Silver (BRA) and Sunisa Lee (USA) Bronze.

programme.title: The Journey Begins
programme.desc: With the Tokyo 2020 Olympic Games fast approaching, three of the best gymnasts in the world gear up for the most important year of their lives.

programme.title: Competition Season
programme.desc: Morgan and Angelina attempt to handle the pressure of the world stage. Will they succeed? Yile has a point to prove in training.

programme.title: Personal Best: Paris 2024
programme.desc: Relive the Paris 2024 Olympic Games through the journeys of eight remarkable athletes who pushed past limits, defied expectations, and inspired the world. Featuring Noah Lyles, Faith Kipyegon, Jack Robinson, Huang Yaqiong and Zheng Siwei, Leon Marchand, Olga Kharlan and Cindy Ngamba.

programme.title: Semi-Finals & Finals - Day 6 | Swimming | Olympic Games Paris 2024
programme.desc: This session includes the Women's 200m Butterfly Final, Men's 200m Backstroke Final, Women's 200m Breaststroke Final and Women's 4X200m Freestyle Relay Final. The races took place at Paris La Defense Arena, on 01/08/2024.
